Articles.Content:
Image captions:

  1. close-up
  2. special care must be taken not to hit runway with the tail cone
  3. handles like a sled but takes off after using entire runway
  4. gaining altitude to reach upper atmosphere to reach cruising speed
  5. reached orbit after bouncing off upper atmosphere at 2000 m/s and activating rocket that's disguised as fuselage
  6. showing sustained Kerbin orbit

What started out as an F-14 replica morphed into a SSO re-usable aircraft. Getting the twin jet bodies to attach to the rocket while keeping balance was the hardest part. Once I found out this craft can reach orbit I added 2 basic solar panels, 1 RCS nozzle using the cockpit's built-in RCS fuel, thermometer, 2 z-100 batteries, and Comms DTS-M1 antenna. I didn't reach tier 7 in career mode yet, except for high altitude flight, so it turned out looking stubby. Do not point this craft's nose down more than 25 degrees or you'll send it into a death dive.
